shortdesc.ph: Callback triggered when the publisher's cloud transcoding settings are updated.
Callback for updates to publisher's cloud transcoding configuration.

section.p: When you call and update the configuration, the SDK triggers this callback to report the update.
When calling to update the configuration, the SDK triggers this callback to report the update.
section.note: This callback is not triggered when you call for the first time to set .
This callback is not triggered when is called for the first time to set the configuration.

section.title: Trigger Timing
section.p: This callback is triggered when the publisher's cloud transcoding configuration is updated.
